title: Entitled sister-in-law makes too many food demands for Thanksgiving dinner she's not even hosting, host gets even with leftovers: 'Radio silence after that!'
description: It's never fun when you have a guest who acts like she's the host. It takes a particular kind of human being to have that mentality during a family gathering, but if there's any event that attracts this type of personality, it's most certainly Thanksgiving.Here, we have an entitled sister-in-law who insisted on making a number of Thanksgiving dishes despite the fact that the Redditor expressed a desire to take the lead, as she was the host after all. On top of this tension going into the day, the sister-in-law was difficult once she arrived as well. They ended up only having half an hour to eat because of her shenanigans, so when she left without helping clean the plates, the Redditor couldn't help but notice that she didn't take her precious gravy home with her. That's where the petty revenge comes in!Keep scrolling below for the full story and for the best reactions from folks in the comments section. It's never fun when you have a guest who acts like she's the host. It takes a particular kind of human being to have that mentality during a family gathering, but if there's any event that attracts this type of personality, it's most certainly Thanksgiving.

Here, we have an entitled sister-in-law who insisted on making a number of Thanksgiving dishes despite the fact that the Redditor expressed a desire to take the lead, as she was the host after all. On top of this tension going into the day, the sister-in-law was difficult once she arrived as well. They ended up only having half an hour to eat because of her shenanigans, so when she left without helping clean the plates, the Redditor couldn't help but notice that she didn't take her precious gravy home with her. That's where the petty revenge comes in!
